Html:
I'm currently trying to manually set up my character since the Armory isn't updating my Prot Pally currently (Silivaethor on Ghostlands), and I'm having trouble getting a specific gem into the socket for what I currently have. In the Gem list, it doesn't include anything like, "Vivid Eye of Zul" (my current issue), or Sovereign Dreadstone, and so I can't add them to my items to properly represent what I have. Is there any way I can add in a gem to the list of ones available? Could that be added in the future?

 

I can find the gem in the Item Editor, just can't figure out how to add it.
Make sure you have the "Other" category selected in the filters.    All the gems are filtered into that category.
Ah, I did not try that. Thank you!
